PANDAS

Ref

scikit-learn
 model and a 
STANDARD
 data type (json) for input data to service 
Ref


 After creating a 
run
 and 
init
 methods as in the links above, plus a schema file, begin with "Register a model" found in this 
Doc

  * Note one change required:  there must be, if using certain frameworks, a 
pip
 requirements file (use 
-p
 flag) when creating the manifest
